resolvedIssues.title: Login Button Not Working
resolvedIssues.description: The login button was unresponsive on mobile devices
resolvedIssues.solution: Fixed the event handler for touch devices and improved button accessibility

resolvedIssues.title: Job Search Filter Issues
resolvedIssues.description: Salary range filter wasn't updating the job list correctly
resolvedIssues.solution: Corrected the salary filter logic and added proper state management

resolvedIssues.title: Profile Image Upload Error
resolvedIssues.description: Users couldn't upload profile pictures larger than 1MB
resolvedIssues.solution: Implemented image compression and improved upload handling

resolvedIssues.title: Notification Delay
resolvedIssues.description: Job application notifications were delayed by several hours
resolvedIssues.solution: Optimized notification service and reduced processing time

resolvedIssues.title: Resume Parser Bug
resolvedIssues.description: PDF resumes weren't being parsed correctly
resolvedIssues.solution: Updated PDF parsing library and improved text extraction

resolvedIssues.title: Chat Message Order
resolvedIssues.description: Messages in the chat were sometimes displayed out of order
resolvedIssues.solution: Fixed timestamp sorting and message queue processing

resolvedIssues.title: Application Form Validation
resolvedIssues.description: Form was submitting without required fields being filled
resolvedIssues.solution: Implemented comprehensive form validation with clear error messages

resolvedIssues.title: Search Performance Issues
resolvedIssues.description: Job search was becoming slow with large result sets
resolvedIssues.solution: Implemented pagination and optimized search query performance

resolvedIssues.title: Mobile Layout Bugs
resolvedIssues.description: UI elements were overlapping on smaller screens
resolvedIssues.solution: Improved responsive design and fixed mobile layout issues
